sentences.english: You don't just have to sit in the stands and gape at the exploits of others.
sentences.chinese: 你大可不必坐在看台上，目瞪口呆地盯着别人的战绩。

sentences.english: But his past scoring record is impressive.
sentences.chinese: 但是他过去代表尤文出场的战绩却令人印象深刻。

sentences.english: We are 4-2 at this point , but I think we're getting better and.
sentences.chinese: 现在的战绩是四胜二负，但我想我们会越来越好。

sentences.english: This team ranks first on the tally with an undefeated record.
sentences.chinese: 这支球队以不败的战绩雄居积分榜首。

sentences.english: By the next year, the Bulls had started a winning streak.
sentences.chinese: 到第二年，芝加哥公牛队就开始了其节节胜利的战绩。

sentences.english: It remains Barrichello's best finish at the track.
sentences.chinese: 也是rubens在这条赛道上的最好战绩。

sentences.english: The Lakers have the fifth-best record in the West, but the race for first is tight.
sentences.chinese: 湖人战绩是西部第五，要成为第一，路途艰辛。

sentences.english: Against Liverpool in the Premier League at home Bolton have won two, drawn two and lost four.
sentences.chinese: 迎战利物浦之前，博尔顿的战绩是两胜两平四负。

sentences.english: This season we have had three victories and two defeats.
sentences.chinese: 这一季我们的战绩是三胜两败。

sentences.english: The Lakers also raised their record to 6-0 when all five starters score in double figures.
sentences.chinese: 湖人队在先发得分都上双的时候战绩也达到6胜0负。

sentences.english: We are 4-2 at this point, but I think we're getting better and better.
sentences.chinese: 现在的战绩是四胜二负，但我想我们会越来越好。

sentences.english: Loosing only to China is something they can proudly tell their friends back home…
sentences.chinese: 仅负于中国的骄人战绩也足可以告慰家乡父老了。

sentences.english: I wish my teammates a million successes until I get back.
sentences.chinese: 衷心祝福队友们在我归来的时候取得彪炳的战绩。

sentences.english: The Reds have endured a disappointing campaign so far after a second-place finish last time out.
sentences.chinese: 在经历了上赛季的失望后，本赛季利物浦战绩糟糕。

sentences.english: We worked our tails off and finished the season undefeated.
sentences.chinese: 我们努力了一个赛季，以全胜战绩结束了常规赛。

definition: to bear/to carry (on one's back)/to turn one's back on/to be defeated/negative (math. etc)

victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)
total victory/to excel by far/name of a tank/slam
consecutive defeats/to lose several times in a row
to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither
table of scores (in exams or sports league)
to be utterly defeated/to be routed
to defeat decisively/to win decisively/great victory/triumph
poised for battle/to square up for a fight
opening (chess etc)/early stage of game, match, work, activity etc
